cause.description:
Rachel was 21 years old when she passed away while waiting on a kidney and a liver. When she was 3 and a half years old she was diagnoised with a very rare cancer that affects the liver. In her lifetime she had one liver transplant ans 3 kidney transplant. She also endured many blood tranfusions.
1. Awareness needs to be raised
2. Recycle yourself and help save a life
cause.name: The Rachel Heaton Fund
